title: Aboriginal Education in Victoria: VAECG
creator_credit: Vincent O'Donnell, Melbourne State College. Media Production Centre and Open Channel Productions
brief_description: Explains the workings of the Victorian Aboriginal Education Consultative Group. Shows how the group operates with Aboriginal and non-Aboriginal people in Shepparton, Robinvale and Echuca. Introduced by Norman Lacy, Assistant Minister of Education.
creator_credit_for_label: Vincent O’Donnell, Melbourne State College. Media Production Centre and Open Channel Productions
